price: 32. Iyo inaan baarri u ahaado hooyaday, igamana dhigin macangag khayr daran.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
